verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Nimeingia (kwako) hapa mahali patakatifu unipokee (kwako) unitakase nipate neema.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 2. Ee Bwana Mwema wewe mfadhili sana nakuja kwako kukutukuza.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 3.Nakuabudu pia nakusujudu, nisaidie mimi ni wako.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 4. Mimi mkristu pokea sala mnyonge ninakuomba unisikize.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 5. Nihurumie kwani mimi mnyonge, nategemea msaada wako.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: 6. Unipokee kwako unipokee unitakase nipate neema.
